snippet: The Federal Bureau of Investigation on Tuesday added Eric J. Toth to its 10 Most Wanted list of fugitives, filling a vacancy left by Osama bin Laden’s death.
abstract: Federal Bureau of Investigation adds Eric J Toth, teacher from the Washington area accused of possessing child pornography, to FBI's 10 Most Wanted list of fugitives, filling vacancy left by Osama bin Laden’s death.
lead_paragraph: The Federal Bureau of Investigation on Tuesday added Eric J. Toth to its 10 Most Wanted list of fugitives, filling a vacancy left by Osama bin Laden’s death.

headline.seo: Osama Bin Laden Replaced on F.B.I.’s Most Wanted List
headline.main: To Replace Bin Laden on Most Wanted List, a Teacher in a Pornography Case
headline.print_headline: To Replace Bin Laden on Most Wanted List, a Teacher in a Pornography Case
